insight: Stimulates the flow of defensive ki and opens the surface for releasing external pathogens. Useful for neck stiffness and respiratory issues.
Used to open nasal passages and clear heat. Effective in relieving sinus congestion, allergies, and facial swelling.
Calms the mind and clears Lung heat. Used for grief, anxiety, and emotional imbalance affecting breath.
Opens the chest and activates arm circulation. Supports emotional release and relieves shoulder pain.
Anatomical strike point on the side of the neck. Not a traditional pressure point - used for martial application only.
Alleviates temporal headaches, jaw tension, and facial nerve disorders. Useful for TMJ and ear-related pain.
Anatomical strike point on the other side of the neck. Not a traditional pressure point - used for martial application only.
Controls the collateral vessels of the body and can relieve whole-body pain, fibromyalgia, or lateral rib tenderness.
Strengthens original Qi and benefits urogenital system. Used for reproductive health and lower abdominal issues.
Regulates the Heart and calms the spirit. Helpful for emotional distress, anxiety, and upper abdominal discomfort.
Benefits the tongue and throat. Used for speech difficulty, dry mouth, and loss of voice.
Front-Mu point of the Spleen. Harmonizes Liver and Spleen, relieves abdominal fullness and rib-side tension.
Treats stiffness of the tongue and neck. Benefits speech and calms the spirit. Caution with deep needling.
Calms the mind and benefits the brain. Used in cases of insomnia, anxiety, and frontal headaches.
Disperses breast swelling and clears damp-heat from the chest. Used for mastitis, chest pain, and insufficient lactation.
